description: Simple and delicious, you'll love making this one tray prawn bake with tomato and feta as much as your family will love eating it.
name: One-Tray Spanish-Style Baked Prawns Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
1kg green prawns, peeled, deveined, heads and tails intact
0.5 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked, finely chopped
1 olive sourdough loaf, thickly sliced (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/ 180°C fan-forced. Combine oil, chorizo and paprika in a large, deep baking dish. Add garlic and truss tomatoes, then bake for 15 minutes or until chorizo is crisp.
Add cherry tomatoes, prawns and chilli flakes. Season, then gently toss to combine. Bake for 15 minutes or until prawns have changed colour and are cooked through.
Scatter over parsley and feta, then serve with sourdough and lemon wedges.
